INSERT INTO amp_columns(columnid, columnName, aliasname, tokenexpression, cellType, extractorview, description) VALUES (nextval('amp_columns_seq'),'Calculated Project Life','calculatedProjectLife', 'calculatedProjectLife', 'org.dgfoundation.amp.ar.cell.ComputedDateCell','v_computed_dates','Difference in days between Planned Start Date and Actual Completion Date');
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_computed_dates AS SELECT amp_activity.amp_activity_id, amp_activity.activity_close_date, amp_activity.actual_start_date, amp_activity.actual_approval_date, amp_activity.activity_approval_date, amp_activity.proposed_start_date, amp_activity.actual_completion_date, amp_activity.proposed_completion_date, amp_activity.original_comp_date FROM amp_activity ORDER BY amp_activity.amp_activity_id;
